main.title: Real-time Fleet Intelligence
main.subtitle: A visual based AI Safety for Fleet Management
main.slogan:
Real-time Fleet Intelligence

for Enhanced Safety and Efficiency

section_1.title: Transform Your Fleet Management with AI!
section_1.subtitle: placeholders
section_1.content: For commercial fleets, safety, efficiency, and carbon reduction are paramount. OmniEyes delivers a powerful yet intuitive AI-powered fleet management system that effectively reduces operational risks and costs.

block_1.title: Social Responsibility (Safety)
block_1.subtitle: placeholders
block_1.content: Safety is a daily challenge for every commercial fleet. Beyond reducing unnecessary operational costs and accident-related delays, it's the cornerstone of corporate social responsibility.

block_2.title: Corporate Governance (Efficiency)
block_2.subtitle: placeholders
block_2.content: True efficiency goes beyond pushing drivers to speed up. By leveraging AI to capture experienced drivers' insights and combining them with effective management tools, we empower fleet managers to maximize their team's potential.

block_3.title: Environmental Protection (Energy Saving)
block_3.subtitle: placeholders
block_3.content: MyFleet combines OBDII interface with AI video analytics to monitor fleet fuel consumption, engine performance, and driving behavior in real-time, helping businesses achieve sustainability goals while reducing operational costs.

painpoints.title:
In the past experience,
have you encountered the following problems?
painpoints.subtitle: placeholders

painpoint_1.name: Fleet Management Boss
painpoint_1.content: Hardware installation or upgrades not only delay delivery efficiency but also cause delays in system upgrades.

painpoint_2.name: Fleet Management Boss
painpoint_2.content: In order to improve fleet safety and meet increasingly stringent regulatory requirements, various hardware is continuously purchased, but the functions cannot be integrated with each other.

painpoint_3.name: Fleet Management Boss
painpoint_3.content: Information from different devices and systems cannot be synchronized and integrated in the cloud.

painpoint_4.name: Fleet Management Boss
painpoint_4.content: Equipment failures or human damage cannot be grasped in time.

painpoint_5.name: Fleet Management Boss
painpoint_5.content: Detecting sudden braking, sudden deceleration, or even installing vision assistance or ADAS cannot effectively reduce dangerous driving.

painpoint_6.name: Fleet Management Boss
painpoint_6.content: The frequent and annoying warning sounds of auxiliary driving do not help improve driving safety, but only distract the driver.

painpoint_7.name: Fleet Management Boss
painpoint_7.content: A large amount of cloud data and original images or data will only increase the burden of daily operations and cannot provide fleet management personnel to take immediate action.

products.title: Complete Product System
products.description: OmniEyes delivers comprehensive fleet management solutions, combining hardware equipment and software platforms to simplify your fleet asset management

block_1.title: Rapid Integration, Unlimited Scalability
block_1.subtitle: placeholders
block_1.content: Every AI feature in OmniEyes is built on modular software architecture, enabling quick integration and unlimited upgrade potential.

block_2.title: Seamless Sensor Integration
block_2.subtitle: placeholders
block_2.content: Our robust hardware platform connects with various sensors and peripheral devices, synchronizing all operational and fleet management data at the vehicle edge, streamlining data processing and reducing manpower requirements.

block_3.title: Information Integration
block_3.subtitle: placeholders
block_3.content: MyFleet's interface consolidates all essential information. Access vehicle status, driving behavior, and sensor data with just a few clicks, combined with temporal and location data for immediate action.

block_4.title: Reduced Fleet Costs
block_4.subtitle: placeholders
block_4.content: OmniEyes monitors traffic violations and risky driving behavior in real-time, integrated with driver education platforms. These recordings serve as valuable training materials, effectively reducing training costs.

block_5.title: Clear, Consistent Voice Prompts
block_5.subtitle: placeholders
block_5.content: Busy deliveries are stressful enough, and with clear and consistent voice prompts, drivers only get help when they need it most.

section_4.title: All-in-One Management Platform: Break Free from Limitations
section_4.subtitle: placeholders
section_4.content: OmniEyes delivers powerful AI capabilities, seamlessly integrating essential fleet functions including fuel efficiency tracking, carbon footprint monitoring, mileage reports, real-time positioning, POD (Proof of Delivery), and video search. Through cloud computing and edge computing, we offer customizable service triggers, parameters, and feature settings, enabling you to easily create a tailored management suite and control center for your fleet.

main.title: MyFleet - The Next Generation AI Fleet Management Platform
main.subtitle: Enhance safety, digitize workflows, and eliminate redundant tasks by converting them into automated notifications.
main.description: MyFleet is a comprehensive AI fleet management platform that integrates AI image recognition technology, real-time vehicle positioning, driving dynamics analysis, vehicle maintenance reminders, and other functions to assist fleet managers in risk management and reduce operating costs.

section_1.title: Edge Enhanced with AI Box & AI Copilot
section_1.content: MyFleet integrates AI Box & AI Copilot. Edge computing advantages provide massive computing power for real-time recognition and notifications.

feature_1.title: Real-time tracking
feature_1.content: MyFleet's map interface presents comprehensive fleet asset status on a single screen. Managers can quickly locate specific vehicles through multiple filtering options, monitoring vehicle locations, task execution status, and violation alerts in real-time.

feature_2.title: Vehicle Driving Dynamics
feature_2.content: The system combines vehicle driving paths, AI event images, and OBDII diagnostic data to deliver comprehensive vehicle behavior analysis. Administrators can access detailed driving routes and stop locations, along with abnormal event indicators, to create a complete driving history database. Vehicle status data gathered through the OBDII interface enables early risk detection and helps prevent breakdowns.

feature_3.title: AI Event Recording
feature_3.content: OmniEyes' AI Copilot technology analyzes and assesses driving behavior in real time. The system automatically captures footage and data when it detects violations, including ViViD traffic infractions, OmniGuard risk alerts, and DriverCare unsafe driving patterns. These digital records help fleet managers implement standardized safety protocols.

feature_4.title: Safe Driving Training
feature_4.content: MyFleet's driver training feature uses OmniEyes' AI imaging technology to analyze drivers' long-term driving patterns. The system tracks and visualizes safe driving trends by collecting data on driving behaviors. Fleet managers can assess risks, spot potential safety issues in real-time, and offer specific guidance to drivers. This approach enhances driving standards and safety awareness while lowering accident rates.

feature_5.title: Vehicle Maintenance Alerts
feature_5.content: Regular vehicle maintenance scheduling is key to maintaining stable operational efficiency. MyFleet provides a comprehensive maintenance management dashboard that tracks vehicle inspections, maintenance, and insurance records, with detailed cost trend analysis. The system sends timely notifications for upcoming maintenance, enabling fleet managers to optimize resource allocation and maximize productivity.

feature_6.title: Fleet Hierarchy Management
feature_6.content: MyFleet's user control interface supports up to four-tier management structures, allowing various fleet types to implement detailed permission controls and establish efficient reporting and monitoring mechanisms. Fleet customers can configure the organizational structure within MyFleet to match their existing hierarchy, ensuring powerful features reach every operational level while maintaining established corporate reporting protocols.

feature_7.title: Custom Location Application
feature_7.content: MyFleet offers maximum flexibility in map applications. Fleet operators can create and manage custom locations, utilizing these landmarks for vehicle dwell time statistics, event triggers, and arrival notifications, providing a fully customizable solution for location-based fleet management needs.

main.title: AI Copilot
main.subtitle: Three major AI modules to help you improve fleet safety
main.description: AI Copilot is an AI driving assistance system created by OmniEyes for fleet managers. Through AI image recognition technology, it analyzes driving behavior in real time, provides driving risk warnings, and assists fleet managers in establishing standardized safety management systems.

section_1.title: AI Copilot
section_1.subtitle: placeholders
section_1.content: AI Copilot is an AI driving assistance system created by OmniEyes for fleet managers. Through AI image recognition technology, it analyzes driving behavior in real time, provides driving risk warnings, and assists fleet managers in establishing standardized safety management systems.

block_1.title: ViViD Traffic Violations
block_1.subtitle: placeholders
block_1.content: ViViD traffic violations are one of the core functions of AI Copilot. Through AI image recognition technology, it can instantly identify vehicle violations, such as running red lights, driving in the wrong direction, illegal parking, etc., and automatically record relevant images and data to assist fleet managers in establishing standardized safety management systems.

block_2.title: OmniGuard Real-time Risk Alerts
block_2.subtitle: placeholders
block_2.content: OmniGuard real-time risk alert is one of the core functions of AI Copilot. Through AI image recognition technology, it can instantly identify driving behaviors, such as sudden braking, sudden acceleration, and sharp turns, and automatically record relevant images and data to assist fleet managers in establishing standardized safety management systems.

block_3.title: DriverCare
block_3.subtitle: placeholders
block_3.content: DriverCare is one of the core functions of AI Copilot. Through AI image recognition technology, it can instantly identify driving behaviors, such as yawning, distraction, and mobile phone operation, and automatically record relevant images and data to assist fleet managers in establishing standardized safety management systems.

main.title: Powerful Fleet Intelligence API
main.subtitle: Integrate AI-powered visual analytics and fleet management capabilities directly into your existing systems
main.description: OmniEyes' API service provides a powerful set of tools for integrating AI-powered visual analytics and fleet management capabilities directly into your existing systems. Our RESTful API and SDKs are designed to be easy to use and flexible, allowing you to quickly and easily add advanced fleet management features to your applications.

benefit_1.title: Flexible Integration
benefit_1.content: Native integration with existing fleet management systems. Multiple implementation options (REST API, SDK, WebHooks) Scalable architecture for fleets of any size

benefit_2.title: Flexible Integration
benefit_2.content: Native integration with existing fleet management systems. Multiple implementation options (REST API, SDK, WebHooks) Scalable architecture for fleets of any size

benefit_3.title: Flexible Integration
benefit_3.content: Native integration with existing fleet management systems. Multiple implementation options (REST API, SDK, WebHooks) Scalable architecture for fleets of any size

main.title: AI Box + Cameras
main.subtitle: AI Box + Cameras
main.description: OmniEyes' AI Box and cameras are designed to provide fleet managers with a comprehensive set of tools for monitoring and managing their vehicles. Our AI Box is a powerful edge computing device that can process large amounts of data in real-time, while our cameras are equipped with advanced image recognition technology that can identify objects and events with high accuracy.

features.title: Video Retrieval
features.content: Access and retrieve video footage wirelessly for event analysis.

features.title: Video Retrieval
features.content: Access and retrieve video footage wirelessly for event analysis.

main.title: About Us
main.subtitle: About OmniEyes
main.description: OmniEyes Technology is a startup company focused on AI fleet management solutions. Our mission is to improve fleet safety, efficiency, and sustainability through AI image recognition technology.

introSection.title: OmniEyes Technology
introSection.subtitle: OmniEyes Technology is a startup company focused on AI fleet management solutions. Our mission is to improve fleet safety, efficiency, and sustainability through AI image recognition technology.
introSection.content: Our AI fleet management system, MyFleet, integrates AI image recognition technology, real-time vehicle positioning, driving dynamics analysis, vehicle maintenance reminders, and other functions to assist fleet managers in risk management and reduce operating costs.

founderSection.title: Co-Founders and Management Team
founderSection.subtitle: The team was established in 2017 with the assistance of the Ministry of Science and Technology's Value Creation Program (TRUST-U) by three professors from National Taiwan University. Our team has top-notch AI and software capabilities, as well as professional business development and management talents, and is now gradually growing into a competitive startup company.

person_1.name: Chun-Ting Chou
person_1.title: CEO and Co-Founder
person_1.description: Professor at National Taiwan University, with 20 years of experience in wireless communications, IoT, and edge computing. He holds over 30 patents in the field of wireless communication protocols from IEEE and ECMA standards. CEO Chou has received numerous awards, including the Young Oversea Scholar Award, the Pan Wen Yuan IoT Innovation Award, the Ministry of Science and Technology Entrepreneurship Pioneer Award, and the National Taiwan University Academic Contribution Award.

person_2.name: Tyson King
person_2.title: CCO
person_2.description: Specializes in developing effective market entry strategies and has leadership experience in Fortune 500 companies and successful tech startups that have been acquired or gone public. Focuses on wireless communications, IoT platforms, and artificial intelligence solutions.

person_3.name: Ai-Jun Pang
person_3.title: Co-Founder
person_3.description: Professor at National Taiwan University, with 20 years of experience in multimedia networks and mobile communications. Professor Pang is an IEEE Fellow and a recipient of the IEEE Women in Vehicle Technology Award, the Ministry of Science and Technology Outstanding Research Award, and the Pan Wen Yuan Foundation-IoT Innovation Award.

person_4.name: Shou-De Lin
person_4.title: Co-Founder
person_4.description: Professor at National Taiwan University, with 20 years of experience in artificial intelligence, machine learning (ML), and natural language processing. He has received the Google Research Award, the Microsoft Research Award, and 7 championships in the ACM KDD Cup. He previously served as the Chief Scientist at Appier, leading the AI scientist team to promote the implementation of AI, and has received many corporate awards.

person_5.name: Szu-Hang Wu
person_5.title: CFO
person_5.description: Has over 20 years of experience in finance in accounting firms, banking, and retail industries, focusing primarily on business planning and forecasting, financial management, internal control, and risk management.

person_1.name: Shu-Chen Lin
person_1.description: Director and Vice President of Fubon Financial Holdings Venture Capital Co., Ltd. Carey has over 20 years of experience in venture capital, strategic investment, and mergers and acquisitions. In addition to investing in the technology, retail, media, sports, entertainment, and renewable energy industries, Carey has also facilitated the establishment of new businesses such as momo Shopping Channel and momo Kids Channel. She has also executed several M&A transactions for the Fubon Group. Carey also represents Fubon Financial Holdings Venture Capital as a board member of its portfolio companies (mainly renewable energy, infrastructure, and technology companies).

person_2.name: Szu-Pen Wu
person_2.description: Senior Special Assistant to the Chairman of Wistron Corporation. Responsible for early-stage startup investments within the company. He previously served as President of Wistron Optronics and General Manager of Wistron Optronics Business Unit. He has extensive experience in product marketing, business development, and operations in the hardware industry.

person_3.name: Shou-De Lin
person_3.description: Professor at National Taiwan University, with 20 years of experience in artificial intelligence, machine learning (ML), and natural language processing. He has received the Google Research Award, the Microsoft Research Award, and 7 championships in the ACM KDD Cup. He previously served as the Chief Scientist at Appier, leading the AI scientist team to promote the implementation of AI, and has received many corporate awards.

person_4.name: Chieh-Chih Cheng
person_4.description: Founder and host of Shin Law International Law Firm, specializing in handling various civil and criminal litigation, non-litigation, intellectual property, or arbitration cases. He has published several law-related books. He serves as a lecturer in civil and commercial law at the Department of Finance at Yuan Ze University, a consultant lawyer for public sector, an arbitrator of the Arbitration Association (engineering category), a legal advisor to the National Federation of Pharmacists Associations of the Republic of China, the National Federation of Western Medicine Commercial Associations, and a member of the Highway Bus Passenger Transport Review Committee of the Directorate General of Highways, Ministry of Transportation and Communications.

teamSection.title: Our Team
teamSection.content: OmniEyes was established in 2019 by leading venture capital and the National Development Fund, specializing in innovative solutions using mobile communications and artificial intelligence. The OmniEyes team was founded in 2017 by three professors from National Taiwan University, evolving from a renowned university in Taiwan to a unicorn startup (TRUST-U), and is now gradually becoming a truly competitive startup company with top-notch artificial intelligence and software capabilities, as well as professional business development and management.

main.title: School Bus
main.subtitle: Enhance Safety, Digitize Workflows, and Reduce Repetitive Tasks through Proactive Notifications
main.description: An AI fleet management platform built by OmniEyes for school bus operators. Through AI video recognition technology, it analyzes driving behavior in real-time, provides driving risk alerts, and helps fleet managers establish standardized safety management systems.

painpoints.mainTitle: School Transportation Shouldn't Be a Nightmare for Parents or Students

point_1.title: Recurring Accidents at the Same Location
point_1.description: Multiple collisions at the same spot resulted in two student injuries and class reduction by the Education Bureau.

point_2.title: Driver Health Issues
point_2.description: A school bus driver's health condition led to a guardrail collision, resulting in six students being hospitalized.

point_3.title: Dangerous Driving Behavior
point_3.description: School bus illegally crossed double white lines, terrifying witnesses.

aiFeatures.mainTitle: AI Intelligent System: Comprehensive Protection for Drivers and Students

feature_1.title: Red Light Running
feature_1.description: The system monitors traffic light status and issues warnings when drivers are about to run red lights, preventing serious intersection accidents.

feature_2.title: Distracting
feature_2.description: Using object detection technology, the system identifies if drivers are using phones and provides immediate reminders to prevent distracted driving.

feature_3.title: Speeding Warning
feature_3.description: The system continuously monitors vehicle speed and issues warnings during prolonged speeding, helping drivers maintain safe speeds.

feature_4.title: No Stop at Stop Sign
feature_4.description: The system monitors stop signs at intersections without traffic lights and issues warnings when drivers fail to stop, helping prevent intersection collisions.

feature_5.title: Fatigue
feature_5.description: Using facial recognition technology, the system detects signs of fatigue such as yawning and provides timely reminders to reduce drowsy driving risks.

feature_6.title: Forward Collision Warning
feature_6.description: The system continuously monitors the distance and speed relative to vehicles ahead, issuing warnings when collision risks arise to help maintain safe following distances.

myFleetFeatures.mainTitle: Real-time Monitoring for Parents and School Bus Administrators

feature_1.title: LINE Arrival Notifications
feature_1.description: No additional app installation required. Receive arrival notifications via LINE for convenient student pickup and drop-off, eliminating unnecessary waiting.

feature_2.title: Real-time Location Tracking
feature_2.description: Parents and pickup personnel can track vehicle location and routes in real-time through their browser.

feature_3.title: Driver Behavior Monitoring
feature_3.description: AI system continuously monitors various dangerous behaviors, providing school administrators with hotspot analysis and driver training tools to maintain good driving habits and prevent accidents.

main.title: Heavy Truck
main.subtitle: Enhance Safety, Digitize Workflows, and Reduce Repetitive Tasks through Proactive Notifications
main.description: An AI fleet management platform built by OmniEyes for heavy truck operators. Through AI video recognition technology, it analyzes driving behavior in real-time, provides driving risk alerts, and helps fleet managers establish standardized safety management systems.

point_1.title: High Accident Risk and Blind Spots
point_1.description: Large vehicle size creates numerous blind spots, leading to frequent collision risks during turns and lane changes. With significant mass and longer braking distances, accidents often result in severe casualties, causing substantial losses and potential damage to company reputation.

point_2.title: Complex Road Rights Restrictions
point_2.description: Heavy trucks must comply with specific route and time restrictions. Improper route planning can lead to violations, increasing operational costs and risks.

point_3.title: Long-haul Transport Fatigue
point_3.description: Extended periods of driving heavy vehicles consume significant physical energy, increasing fatigue-related driving risks and threatening road safety.

aiFeatures.mainTitle: AI Intelligent System: The Best Guardian for Heavy Truck Safety

feature_1.title: Speeding Warning
feature_1.description: The system automatically determines speed limits based on road types and continuously monitors compliance. It issues immediate warnings when approaching speed limits and records violations for review through MyFleet.

feature_2.title: No Stop at Stop Sign
feature_2.description: For unsigned intersections, the system automatically recognizes stop signs, alerts drivers to prepare for deceleration, and monitors complete stops to ensure road safety.

feature_3.title: Fatigue
feature_3.description: Using advanced facial recognition technology, the system continuously analyzes drivers' eye blinks and mouth movements to detect fatigue symptoms and provide timely rest reminders.

feature_4.title: No Seat Belt
feature_4.description: The system monitors seatbelt usage from vehicle startup, ensuring drivers remain buckled throughout the journey. It issues immediate alerts if seatbelts are unfastened while driving.

feature_5.title: Forward Collision Warning
feature_5.description: The system automatically calculates safe following distances based on speed and road conditions, providing early warnings when following distance becomes too close.

feature_6.title: Approaching Traffic Light
feature_6.description: Real-time traffic signal recognition provides advance warnings of changing signals, helping drivers make early deceleration decisions for intersection safety.

feature_1.title: MDVR Driving Vision Assistance
feature_1.description: Multi-camera configuration provides complete cabin panoramic vision, real-time vehicle surroundings display, eliminates blind spots, supports reverse and turn assistance, reduces collision risks, and provides complete video evidence in case of accidents.

feature_2.title: TPMS Tire Pressure and Temperature Monitoring
feature_2.description: Real-time monitoring of each tire's pressure and temperature, multiple alert thresholds, early anomaly detection, automatic pressure trend recording, maintenance cycle prediction, reduced blowout risk, and extended tire life.

feature_3.title: Smart Alcohol Testing Management
feature_3.description: Integrates alcohol interlock, ensures zero tolerance for drunk driving, mandatory testing before startup, prevents drunk driving, automatically records test results, complete risk control, immediate reporting of abnormal results for prompt handling.

main.title: General Fleet
main.subtitle: Enhance Safety, Digitize Workflows, and Reduce Repetitive Tasks through Proactive Notifications
main.description: An AI fleet management platform built by OmniEyes for general fleet operators. Through AI video recognition technology, it analyzes driving behavior in real-time, provides driving risk alerts, and helps fleet managers establish standardized safety management systems.

point_1.title: Low Workforce Management Efficiency
point_1.description: Complex driver scheduling, time-consuming manual roster planning, and difficult temporary arrangements.

point_2.title: Difficult Safety Management
point_2.description: Hard to monitor driving behavior in real-time, challenging to correct dangerous driving habits promptly, and difficult post-accident investigation.

point_3.title: High Operating Costs
point_3.description: Difficult to control fuel consumption and maintenance costs effectively, redundant equipment investments with integration challenges, and rising labor costs.

aiFeatures.mainTitle: AI Intelligent System: The Best Assistant for Fleet Management

feature_1.title: Red Light Running
feature_1.description: The system monitors traffic signals in real-time and issues warnings when drivers are about to run red lights, effectively preventing serious traffic accidents.

feature_2.title: No Stop at Stop Sign
feature_2.description: The system automatically recognizes stop signs at unsigned intersections, reminding drivers to slow down and stop in time to prevent accidents.

feature_3.title: Speeding Warning
feature_3.description: The system continuously monitors vehicle speed and provides immediate alerts when exceeding speed limits, helping drivers maintain safe speeds.

feature_4.title: Forward Collision Warning
feature_4.description: The system calculates distance from vehicles ahead in real-time, providing early warnings of potential collisions to maintain safe following distances.

feature_5.title: Distracting
feature_5.description: Using AI recognition technology to detect distracted driving behaviors, such as phone usage, providing immediate reminders to ensure driving safety.

feature_6.title: Fatigue
feature_6.description: The system continuously monitors driver fatigue status, detecting early signs of fatigue and prompting rest breaks to prevent accidents.

feature_1.title: Smart Dispatch Management
feature_1.description: Integrates real-time vehicle location and status information, provides intelligent dispatch suggestions, optimizes route planning, and improves operational efficiency.

feature_2.title: Vehicle Maintenance Management
feature_2.description: Automatically records maintenance history, provides preventive maintenance reminders, reduces unexpected breakdown risks, and extends vehicle lifespan.

feature_3.title: Fuel Consumption Analysis
feature_3.description: Monitors fuel consumption data in real-time, analyzes abnormal fuel consumption causes, provides improvement suggestions, and effectively reduces operating costs.
